name: Outlasting the Dead
blurb: Outlasting the Dead is an action packed 3rd person zombie shooter that tests your reflexes and survival skills.

rewards.reward: A hearty THANK YOU from us at SilverHelm Studios, LLC, an exclusive in game Outlasting the Dead Avatar hat, only available through this Kickstarter campaign, and your name will be featured in the game credits and on the Outlasting the Dead founders page as \u201cZombie Contributors\u201d

You will receive the exclusive Outlasting the Dead in game title of \u201cBlood Giver\u201d an exclusive in game Outlasting the Dead Avatar hat, only available through this Kickstarter campaign, a preemptive first look at ALPHA and your name will be featured in the game credits and on the Outlasting the Dead founders page as \u201cZombie Contributors\u201d

You will receive the exclusive Outlasting the Dead in game title and medallion of \u201cBrain Donor\u201d, an exclusive in game Outlasting the Dead Avatar hat, only available through this Kickstarter campaign, a preemptive first look at ALPHA and your name will be featured in the game credits and on the Outlasting the Dead founders page as \u201cZombie Contributors\u201d
Receive a free copy of the game upon release! Plus the rewards from the $40 pledge!
Receive a free copy of the game and all additional DLC available upon release (includes 2 rare avatars, 12 alternate outfits and 5 new weapons.) Plus the rewards from the $40 pledge!

An element of game content in one of the 10 original levels named by you. (Note: names cannot violate copyright, trademark or other name infringement) Content such as the name of a hospital wing, a cola brand name, a billboard advertisement, school name, military installation name, street name, dungeon name etc . Plus all the rewards above!

Create a one of a kind saying that will be added to the voice acted script for our voice actors and incorporated into the game for one of the 12 in game Avatars. (Note: sayings must be respectful and is at the discretion of the Outlasting the Dead development team for final approval based on content.) a preemptive first look at ALPHA and BETA, the "Brain Donor" title and Medallion, and your name will be featured in the game credits and on the Outlasting the Dead founders page as \u201cZombie Contributors\u201d

Receive a free copy of the game and all additional DLC available upon release (includes 2 rare avatars, 12 alternate outfits and 5 new weapons) and all DLC created and released for 1 year You will receive the exclusive Outlasting the Dead in game title and medallion of \u201cMortician\u201d, a preemptive first look at ALPHA and BETA your name will be featured in the game credits and on the Outlasting the Dead founders page as \u201c Elite Zombie Contributors\u201d.

Receive a free copy of the game and all additional DLC available for the life of the game. You will receive the exclusive Outlasting the Dead in game title and medallion of \u201cBag and Tagger\u201d, a preemptive first look at ALPHA and BETA, and your name will be featured in the game credits and on the Outlasting the Dead founders page as \u201c Elite Zombie Contributors\u201d

Make your mark on the arsenal of the game by creating your own custom weapon. This can be anything from a potato launcher to a pistol rail gun. You\u2019ll work directly with the Game Designer Chad Dulac to create an original weapon of your choosing, assist in the artistic design and then be able to name the weapon of choice. (Note names cannot violate copyright, trademark or other name infringement). You will also receive a free copy of the game and all additional DLC available for the life of the game. You will receive the exclusive Outlasting the Dead in game title and medallion of \u201cHand Cannoneer\u201d, a preemptive first look at ALPHA and BETA your name will be featured in the game credits and on the Outlasting the Dead founders page as \u201cElite Zombie Contributors\u201d

After the game is released we are far from finished making great content.  Within the first year, only four additional Avatars will be created as expansion playable characters. With a pledge of $10,000 or more you\u2019ll work directly with the Game Designer Chad Dulac to create an original story, assist in the artistic design of face, hair, starting clothes and 4 additional unlockable or downloadable outfits, and then be able to name the Avatar of choice. (Note names cannot violate copyright, trademark or other name infringement). You will also receive a free copy of the game and all additional DLC available for the life of the game. You will receive the exclusive Outlasting the Dead in game title and medallion of \u201cEpic Survivor\u201d, a preemptive first look at ALPHA and BETA, and  your name will be featured in the game credits and on the Outlasting the Dead founders page as \u201cEpic Zombie Contributors\u201d
